title: Apple Chicken Brine
directions: Stir vegetable broth, apple juice, kosher salt, black pepper, and herbes de Provence together in a pot; bring to a boil, stirring until salt is completely dissolved. Cool completely, transfer to a container or resealable bag, and refrigerate until chilled.
ingredients: 1 gallon vegetable broth, or to taste
1 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper, or more to taste
1 teaspoon herbes de Provence, or more to taste
